name: part_004
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio and Nakiri Ayame celebrate and discuss the music they hear.
Mio and Ayame perform a duet of 'Uchiage Hanabi' with fireworks in the background.
Mio and Ayame enjoy the fireworks after their performance.

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: あれ？この曲...
subtitles.english: Huh? This song...

subtitles.original: なんか聞こえる。
subtitles.english: I hear something.

subtitles.original: なんか聞いたことある。
subtitles.english: I've heard it somewhere before.

subtitles.original: うん、なんだっけ？
subtitles.english: Yeah, what was it?

subtitles.original: え、じゃあこの曲二人で歌おうか？
subtitles.english: Oh, then shall we sing this song together?

subtitles.original: 歌おうか！
subtitles.english: Let's sing it!

subtitles.original: え、二人で歌うの初めて！
subtitles.english: Wow, our first time singing together!

subtitles.original: 楽しみだな！
subtitles.english: I'm so excited!

subtitles.original:
打上花火
作詞・作曲：米津玄師
subtitles.english:
Uchiage Hanabi
Lyrics/Composition: Kenshi Yonezu

subtitles.original: あの日見渡した渚を 今も思い出すんだ
subtitles.english: I still remember that beach we looked out over that day

subtitles.original: 砂の上に刻んだ言葉 君の後ろ姿
subtitles.english: Words carved in the sand, and the sight of you from behind

subtitles.original: 寄り返す波が 足元をよぎり何かをさらう
subtitles.english: The returning waves wash over my feet and take something away

subtitles.original: 夕凪の中 日暮れだけが通り過ぎて行く
subtitles.english: In the evening calm, only the twilight passes by

subtitles.original: パッと光って咲いた 花火を見ていた
subtitles.english: We watched the fireworks bloom with a sudden flash

subtitles.original: きっとまだ 終わらない夏が
subtitles.english: A summer that surely hasn't ended yet

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心を 解かして繋いだ
subtitles.english: It melted our ambiguous hearts and tied them together

subtitles.original: この夜が 続いて欲しかった
subtitles.english: I wanted this night to go on forever

subtitles.original: あと何度君と同じ花火を 見られるかなって
subtitles.english: I wonder how many more times I can see the fireworks with you

subtitles.original: 笑う顔に何ができるだろうか
subtitles.english: I wonder what I can do for your smiling face

subtitles.original: 傷つくこと 喜ぶこと 繰り返す波と情動
subtitles.english: Hurting, rejoicing, and the cycle of waves and emotions

subtitles.original: 焦燥 最終列車の音
subtitles.english: Impatience, the sound of the last train

subtitles.original: パッと息を飲めば 消えちゃいそうな光が
subtitles.english: If I held my breath, the light seemed like it might disappear

subtitles.original: きっとまだ 胸に住んでいた
subtitles.english: It must still be living in my heart

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばせば触れた あったかい未来は
subtitles.english: The warm future I could touch if I reached out

subtitles.original: 密かに二人を見ていた
subtitles.english: Was secretly watching the two of us

subtitles.original: パッと花火が
subtitles.english: Suddenly, fireworks

subtitles.original: 夜に咲いた
subtitles.english: Bloomed in the night

subtitles.original: 夜に咲いて
subtitles.english: Blooming in the night

subtitles.original: 夜に咲いて
subtitles.english: Blooming in the night

subtitles.original: 静かに消えた
subtitles.english: Quietly disappeared

subtitles.original: 離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go

subtitles.original: もう少しだけ
subtitles.english: Just a little longer

subtitles.original: もう少しだけ
subtitles.english: Just a little longer

subtitles.original: このままで
subtitles.english: Just like this

subtitles.original: あの日見渡した渚を 今も思い出すんだ
subtitles.english: I still remember that beach we looked out over that day

subtitles.original: 砂の上に刻んだ言葉 君の後ろ姿
subtitles.english: Words carved in the sand, and the sight of you from behind

subtitles.original: パッと光って咲いた 花火を見ていた
subtitles.english: We watched the fireworks bloom with a sudden flash

subtitles.original: きっとまだ 終わらない夏が
subtitles.english: A summer that surely hasn't ended yet

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心を 解かして繋いだ
subtitles.english: It melted our ambiguous hearts and tied them together

subtitles.original: この夜が 続いて欲しかった
subtitles.english: I wanted this night to go on forever

subtitles.original: たまやー！
subtitles.english: Tamaya~!

subtitles.original: たまやー！
subtitles.english: Tamaya~!

subtitles.original: すごい！めっちゃ花火上がってる！
subtitles.english: Amazing! So many fireworks are going up!

subtitles.original: 綺麗だねー！
subtitles.english: It's beautiful!

subtitles.original: きれー！すごい！
subtitles.english: Beautiful! Amazing!

subtitles.original: うわー、これ本当になんか、あははは。
subtitles.english: Wow, this is really like, ahahaha.

subtitles.original: 忘れてた！忘れてた！
subtitles.english: I forgot! I forgot!

subtitles.original: あ、歌うの。あははは。
subtitles.english: Oh, about singing. Ahahaha.

subtitles.original: いやー、なんか二人で歌うの初めてだったけど...
subtitles.english: Wow, it was our first time singing together but...
